name: My Camp of Memories: Episode 1
description:
My Camp Of Memories is a visual novel in the genre of romance and adventure.

The Continental Union has a special program for educating the best of the best - the future locomotives of the Revolution. You are eighteen years old and have just entered the last stage of your studies: your final exam in four years.

However, strange fragments of memories, notes and a series of events say that it will not work out to study calmly.

The path you take is entirely in your hands.

It is a fully completed first episode. There will be 4 episodes in total. The remaining episodes will be published as a separate game in the future.
